text: Hi all! I am a current University of Toronto undergrad, very interested in contributing to Julia via the GSoC (Google Summer of Code) program. Specifically, I am thinking about directing my proposal towards building infinite-depth neural networks such as NeuralODEs and Deep Equilibrium Models, as well as infinite-width neural networks such as Neural Tangent Kernels, into the Julia library and enhancing their capabilities. Is there anyone I could contact to develop this idea further? Thanks a lot!

text: Ping<@U69BL50BF> . Do you have any specific project in mind?

elements.text: . Do you have any specific project in mind?

text: I am currently coming up with project ideas. I was inspired when I saw that past students have worked on neuralODEs in Julia (on the GSoC website), and I thought it would be exciting if I could continue building on what they left off, or add desired functionality into the Julia system!
